reciepes.title: Chili con carne
reciepes.description: A spicy and fragrant chili with ground beef, kidney beans, tomatoes, onions and garlic. Best served over rice with a dollop of sour cream and some cheese on top.

method.1: In a medium sized stock pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Saute onions, chile peppers andgarlic until soft.
